ing: 2 fluid ounces white creme de cacao
des: "This sweet and delicious frozen mixed drink features hints of chocolate, coconut, almonds, and cherries. This recipe is a best-guess for a beverage friends encountered while visiting Seattle."
ins: Fill a blender with ice; add the amaretto, creme de cacao, coconut cream, and whipping cream; blend until smooth. Divide into 6 glasses, garnishing each with a cherry, to serve.
